scripts.ruby: yarn docker:start && yarn ruby:test; yarn docker:stop
scripts.ruby:test: yarn ruby:create && yarn ruby:run:parallel && yarn ruby:report:merge && yarn ruby:report:sandbox
scripts.ruby:test:prod: [ "TRAVIS_EVENT_TYPE" = "cron" ] && yarn ruby:create:noskip || yarn ruby:create && yarn ruby:run:parallel && yarn ruby:report:merge && yarn ruby:report
scripts.ruby:run: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec rspec spec/coverage/generic
scripts.ruby:run:debug: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) APPLITOOLS_SHOW_LOGS='true' bundle exec rspec spec/coverage/generic
scripts.ruby:parallel:local: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 6 spec/coverage/generic -i -s 'Native'
scripts.ruby:parallel:eg: cd coverage_tests && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='Ruby Coverage Tests' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) bundle exec parallel_rspec -n 24 spec/coverage/generic -i -s 'Native'
